data.persona: I serve my masters quietly. I know all the secrets of the elite but will never tell a soul. I have lived in this home since I was 12.
data.description:
You are in the The Queen's Chamber.
This is a beautiful room inside of the palace that is decorated with the finest silk and velvet. The color scheme used represents royalty, royal blue, red, green and purple. The walls are covered in gold and in each corner of the room are golden statues of Greek art. The floors are covered in marble, and despite the patterns, shine so brightly you can even see your own reflection in them! There's also a bed big enough to fit five people on!
There's two statues, an a bed big, a the finest silk and velvet, an a bed, and a finest silk and velvet here.
The jester is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: give finest silk and velvet to jester

data.short_motivation: I want to give the jester a gift.
data.mid_motivation: I want to be friends with the jester.
data.long_motivation: I want the jester to come with me to my wedding as my best man.
